title: Sibila.2012.HDRip.720p.x264.AAC.mp4-Makalakato
description:
Sibila (2012/Documentary/95'/Peru-Chile-Spain-France)

Spanish spoken with English subtitles.


"I remember the night when the history of my family changed. We 

received a phone call from Peru saying that my aunt Sibila was in 

prison accused of forming part of the Shining Path. I was seven 

years old and my parent's protective silence made me transform her 

image into a great mystery. She was kept in prision for 15 years. 

Today she is free and I want to get close to her, to listen and to 

understand." Tesesa Arredondo, director. 

Won Human Rights Award at Buenos Aires International Festival of 

Independent Cinema 2012.


"""""""""""""""""""""
